author: jorton
msg: * testdso.c: Fix build when --disable-dso is used.

author: jorton
msg: * configure.in: Fix "--enable-dso" and clean up DSO implementation
detection: use AC_CHECK_FUNC(foo) not _FUNCS when HAVE_FOO symbols
are not needed; don't rely on APR_ADDTO expanding with a leading
Fail if --enable-dso is passed an unknown implementation name, or if
--disable-dso is not used and an implementation could not be detected.

author: gstein
msg: Avoid the temptation to remember the pool. That can lead to disaster.
(apr_pollset_create): do not store the pool into the new struct

author: gstein
msg: Some functions in the interface had been marked @deprecated. Shift those
to the end of the header, and eliminate their docco, to clarify their
status as (not) part of the API.

author: striker
msg: Add apr_os_pipe_put_ex(), which allows the caller to tell APR
to establish a cleanup on the pipe.
Submitted by: Jeff Trawick, Brad Nicholes
